channel.title: branch on IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in branch on IT Quicktasks

item.title: Deleting a remote git repo branch
item.description: me@mysite:/var/www/sites/mysite.local$ git push origin :release-redesign To git@git-server:mysite.git - [deleted] release-redesign

item.title: Rename git branch
item.description: If on a branch you want renamed git branch -m new-name If on a different branch git branch -m old-name new-name
